{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=AP148 |revision= |est_release_date=03/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless embedded board |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064;IPQ8064, 0VV, Aa830, L0, E242201; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, SATA 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, debug,, |serial=yes,, debug,, RJ11 port |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, E5K895, KC, 1433, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Compex AP148 Akronite Reference Board (Kit)}}
===Features=== * CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz ARMv7 :- Dual-core Snapdragon-based Krait SoC * RAM: ''Micron'' 512MB (32-bit DDR3/1066) * NOR Flash: 32 MB, NAND Flash: 256 MB * 2x PCIe 2.0 (RC) supports 2x [[Compex WLE1200V5-22]] :- Dual Concurrent or Single 4x4 802.11ac * 2x USB 3.0 (Host Mode Only) * 1x SATA 3.0 Port (SSD) * 5x Gigabit Ports * PCM/SLIC interface * I2C interface * UART Debug interface * JTAG Debug interface * Hardware Crypto Engine (for offload IPsec)
==Images== <gallery> File:Compex AP148.png|board top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
